data.text: @Schoolboy_O_ @Blavity @WendyWilliams Reading comp is hard for you, yes?

@Schoolboy_O_ @Blavity @WendyWilliams And I just asked *you* why 5 years, where did you come up with that number? I also *told* you that the protests within the last year, the protests in the US have gotten many more people engaged in politics and those who never thought of running are doing so to affect change.
@Schoolboy_O_ @Blavity @WendyWilliams Perhaps you’re too young to understand or remember any of this?

@Schoolboy_O_ @Blavity @WendyWilliams Major changes have always come from the uprising/protesting of citizens. The Bastille anyone? Civil rights. Women’s suffrage. Governments or groups of people don’t change bc they want to, they do bc their hands are forced by the populace they serve. So, more than popularity.

@Schoolboy_O_ @Blavity @WendyWilliams The second step is action, which we are seeing in people running for office and challenging the status quo. After action comes change. Ever taken a polisci class?

@Schoolboy_O_ @Blavity @WendyWilliams Who made the timeline the last 5 years? That’s pretty fucking arbitrary. I’d say the protests within the last year have accomplished getting many, many more people involved in the going’s on of their countries. That’s the first step, engagement. 1/2

@Schoolboy_O_ @Blavity @WendyWilliams You’re so bright, your command of language is something to behold. What the fuck I’m talking about is that of course protests have worked. Are you blind, deaf, or dumb?
@Schoolboy_O_ @Blavity @WendyWilliams I’m sorry, Mr. Man, that women feeling like someone may listen to them & they’re not alone isn’t enough for your delicate sensibilities.

@Blavity @WendyWilliams This dumb bih is nothing short of a coon. She’s against anything for the Culture and consistently calls anything blue-eyed or blonde beautiful or speaks glowingly about it. She must be high af - but she needs to know blacks made her https://t.co/OzRHbLB1Hc
@Blavity @WendyWilliams That's her business. I personally say fuck her opinion. Any thing else to add??

@Blavity @WendyWilliams The me too movement is beautiful. But we cant forget about the cases where women are lying on good men. The me too movement shouldnt  have to deal with the lies. But I digress.

@Blavity @WendyWilliams I actually watched her show the day she said this. And the way she said it I have to agree. Most black people give R. Kelly a pass. Knowing damn well he should have been locked up since the 90s.
@Blavity This funny because most Black people watch and promote her shit.
